item.title: By: Kotaku
item.dc:creator: Kotaku
item.description:
<strong>Grandmas: The New Frontier in Gaming</strong>
On my list of funny things to see my grandma do is curse, talk on AIM and play video games. But because convincing her to do things would be more trouble than it's worth, my childish dreams will have...
item.content:encoded:
Grandmas: The New Frontier in Gaming

On my list of funny things to see my grandma do is curse, talk on AIM and play video games. But because convincing her to do things would be more trouble than it’s worth, my childish dreams will have…

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
I hate posers too.
BTW, don't google "old grandma hardcore" to try and find Tratch's website of the same name.
No. Really. Don't.
item.content:encoded:
I hate posers too.

BTW, don’t google “old grandma hardcore” to try and find Tratch’s website of the same name.

item.title: By: tratch
item.dc:creator: tratch
item.description: That website totally rips off my website of the same name, although we have completely different content.
item.content:encoded: That website totally rips off my website of the same name, although we have completely different content.
